page.title: 12LOCAL EVENTS,WEST KILBRIDE
page.content: { SCHOOL SPORTS DAY The school sports day is held in the Glen every year about June 12th.They have a variety of races ranging from flat to obstacle races.There are four teams Overton,Hunterston,Crosbie and Ardneil. {B.B. FETE The B.B. Fete is similar to The Gala Week except all the funds go to the B.B,s.This helps them to buy new things for their club.Sometimes they give the money to charity. {ELECTRIFYING THE TRAINS In 1984 trains started to be changed from diesel to electric line.The project is to be completed around 1986.This line will run from Glasgow to Largs through West Kilbride.The trains have been changed to Strathclyde Transport,as have the name boards.
